meanings.definition: Engaging in numerous casual sexual relationships with women.
meanings.sent1: He was womanizing around town, going from one woman to another.
meanings.sent2: She disapproved of his womanizing ways and decided to end their relationship.
meanings.sent3: His womanizing tendencies often got him into trouble with jealous partners.
meanings.sent4: His reputation for womanizing spread like wildfire through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the main character as a womanizing playboy, always on the hunt for his next conquest.

meanings.definition: The act of pursuing or seducing women for romantic or sexual purposes.
meanings.sent1: His womanizing was well-known in the office, earning him a reputation.
meanings.sent2: The womanizing behavior of some men can be disrespectful and harmful.
meanings.sent3: She found his womanizing amusing, thinking he was more charming than serious.
meanings.sent4: The politician's womanizing was a constant topic of gossip among the public.
meanings.sent5: The novel's protagonist was a master of womanizing, always knowing the right words to say.
